eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\label{fermion1} L_{ferm.} &= & {|v|^2 \over g_3^2} \sum\limits_{j
= 1}^N  \left[ -{i\over 2} \bar\psi_j^a \bar\sigma^m  \partial_m
\psi_j^a + {i \over 2 \sqrt{2}} ~ \psi_j^a ( \lambda_j^a -
\lambda_{j+1}^a) - {i \over 2\sqrt{2}}  ~\bar\psi_j^a (
\bar\lambda_j^a - \bar\lambda_{j+1}^a)
\right. \nonumber \\
&& \left. - {1\over 2} ~g^{abc} ~ \bar\psi_j^a \bar\sigma^\mu
\psi_j^b~ A^{j+1,c}_\mu +  {1\over 2} ~g^{abc} ~ \bar\psi_j^a
\bar\sigma^\mu \psi_j^c~ A^{j, b}_\mu + \right.  \nonumber \\  && \left. +
{i\over  \sqrt{2}}~ g^{abc} \left( q^{b}_j ~\bar\lambda_{j+1}^c
\bar\psi_j^a -
    q^{*,a}_j~  \lambda_{j+1}^c \psi_j^b\right)
-    {i\over  \sqrt{2}}~ g^{abc} \left( q^{c}_j ~\bar\lambda_{j}^b
\bar\psi_j^a -
    q^{*,a}_j  ~\lambda_{j}^b \psi_j^c \right)
\right]  \nonumber  \\
& & + {1 \over g_3^2}~\sum\limits_{j = 1}^N \left[ - i
\bar\lambda_j^a \bar\sigma^m  \partial_m \lambda_j^a +  {i\over 2}
f^{abc} \bar\lambda_j^a \bar\sigma^\mu   \lambda_j^c A^{j,b}_\mu
\right]  ~.
\

\begin{eqnarray} \lambda_j &=& {1\over \sqrt{N}}
~\sum\limits_{k = -{N-1\over 2}}^{N-1\over 2} \omega_N^{jk
-{k\over 2}}~ \lambda_k, \qquad \psi_j  =  {\sqrt{2} \over
\sqrt{N} |v|} ~\sum\limits_{k =  -{N-1\over 2}}^{N-1 \over 2}
\omega_N^{-jk}~ \psi_k~,
 \nonumber \\ 
A_{\mu}^{k,a} &=& {1\over \sqrt{N} } ~ \sum\limits_{j= 1}^N
A_{\mu}^{j,a}~ \omega_N^{j k-{k \over 2}}~, \qquad
q_k^a = {|v| \over \sqrt{2 N} } ~ \sum\limits_{j = 1}^N q_j^{a}~ \omega_N^{j k}~,
 \nonumber \\  q_k^{* a} &=& {|v| \over \sqrt{2 N} } ~ \sum\limits_{j = 1}^N
q_j^{* a}~ \omega_N^{- j k} = (q_k^a)^*, \

\begin{eqnarray} \label{fermion6}
  L_{ferm.} &=& {1 \over g_3^2} \sum\limits_{k
= -{N-1\over 2}}^{N-1\over 2} \left[ {\over} - i \( \bar\eta_{k}^a
\bar\sigma^m \partial_m \eta_{k}^a + \bar\chi_{-k}^a \bar\sigma^m
\partial_m \chi_{-k}^a \) + |v| \sin {\pi k \over N} \left(
\bar\eta_{k}^a \bar\sigma^3 \eta_{k}^a
+ \bar\chi_{-k}^a \bar\sigma^3 \chi_{-k}^a \right)  \right]  \nonumber \\
&+& {1 \over \sqrt{N} g_3^2} ~\sum\limits_{k, k^\prime = -{N-1\over
2}}^{N-1\over 2} \left[ -{i\over 2}~ f^{abc} B^{c, k,
k^\prime}_\mu \( \bar\eta_k^a \bar\sigma^\mu \eta_{k^\prime}^b +
\bar\chi_{-k}^a \bar\sigma^\mu \chi_{-k^\prime}^b \) \right.  \nonumber \\  &&
\left. + {1\over 2} ~f^{abc}~ \left( \eta_k^a \chi_{k^\prime}^b
~\phi_{k, k^\prime}^{* c} + \bar\eta_k^a \bar\chi_{k^\prime}^b
~\phi_{k,k^\prime}^c \right) \right] ~. \

\begin{eqnarray} \label{4dfields} B_m^{c, k, k^\prime} &=&
A^{c,k - k^\prime}_m~ \cos^2 \( {\pi (k - k^\prime) \over
2N} \) ,  \nonumber \\  B_3^{c, k, k^\prime} &=& -{i \over \sqrt{2}} \left(
\cos{\pi k \over N} ~q^{*, c}_{k^\prime - k} - \cos{\pi k^\prime
\over N} ~q^c_{k - k^\prime}\right) ~,  \nonumber \\  \phi_{k, k^\prime}^c
&=&  A^{c,k-k^\prime}_3 \cos^2 \( {\pi (k - k^\prime) \over
2N} \)  \nonumber \\  && \qquad - { i \over \sqrt{2}} \left(\cos{\pi k \over
N}~ q^{* c}_{k^\prime - k} + \cos{\pi k^\prime \over N} ~ q^c_{k -
k^\prime} \right)~. \

\begin{eqnarray} \label{tadpole2}
\frac{1}{g^2_{probe}} &=& \frac{1}{2} \sum_{k'=1}^N \Psi(\rho,
\eta, \phi= \frac{2\pi k'}{N})  \nonumber \\ &=& \frac{NC}{2} -
{b_0 \over 16 \pi   v}~ \sum\limits_{(k-k') = -{N-1 \over 2}}^{N-1
\over 2} ~ \left[ \left(1 + {\rho \over v}\right) \sin^2 \left({
\pi (k-k') \over N} \right) + {\rho^2 +
\eta^2 \over 4 v^2} \right]^{-{1\over 2}}~ \\
&\simeq& \frac{NC}{2} -   {b_0 N\over  16 \pi^2 v }  ~
\int\limits_{-{\pi\over 2}}^{\pi \over 2} {d x \over \sqrt{ \sin^2
x + {\rho^2 + \eta^2 \over 4 v^2}}} \simeq  \frac{NC}{2}+ { b_0 N
\over 8 \pi^2
   v} ~ \log {|\rho
+ i \eta| \over 2   v } \nonumber ~, \

\begin{eqnarray}
  \label{u1coupling}
{1 \over
g_{3, D}^2(|A|)} &=& ~{N \over g_3^2} ~- ~
{1\over  2  \pi}~ \sum\limits_{k = -{N-1 \over 2}}^{N-1 \over 2} ~ {1
\over \sqrt{4   v^2 \sin^2
{\pi k \over N} +  {|A|^2}}}~ \nonumber \\
&\simeq&  ~{N \over g_3^2} ~-~ {N \over 4 \pi^2 v}~\int\limits_
{-{\pi\over 2}}^{\pi \over 2} {d x \over \sqrt{ \sin^2
x + {|A|^2 \over 4 v^2}}}  ~. \

\begin{eqnarray} \label{u1coupling2} {1 \over g_4^2 (|A|)} \equiv {v \over
N g_{3, D}^2 (|A|)} = {v \over g_3^2}  - {1 \over 4 \pi^2} ~
\int\limits_{-{\pi\over 2}}^{\pi \over 2} {d x \over \sqrt{ \sin^2
x + {|A|^2 \over 4 v^2}}} ={v \over g_3^2}  + {1 \over 2
\pi^2}~  \ln {|A| \over 2 v}~. \

\begin{eqnarray} \label{limit} N \rightarrow \infty, ~ v
\rightarrow \infty, ~{g_3^2\over v} \rightarrow 0,~ \Lambda^4 = v^4
~e^{- {8 \pi^2 v \over g_3^2}}, ~ \Lambda \ll v~.\

\begin{eqnarray} \label{wilson3}
   v^{-2} \omega^2(k)   =  v^{-2}~|m_k|^2~=  \sin^2 {2 \pi k \over N} +
4  ~\sin^4 {\pi k \over N}~.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
